author: perrotta
body:
Following the request in https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/hlt/3701.html , the following modules in the EventFilter packages have been migrated to the use of the parameterSetDescription:
- EvFFEDSelector from EventFilter/FEDInterface
- EcalRawToDigi from EventFilter/EcalRawToDigi
- ESRawToDigi from EventFilter/ESRawToDigi
- HcalRawToDigi from EventFilter/HcalRawToDigi
- GctRawToDigi from EventFilter/GctRawToDigi
- L1GlobalTriggerRawToDigi from EventFilter/L1GlobalTriggerRawToDigi
- CSCDCCUnpacker from EventFilter/CSCRawToDigi
- DTUnpackingModule from EventFilter/DTRawToDigi
- RPCUnpackingModule from EventFilter/RPCRawToDigi
- ScalersRawToDigi from EventFilter/ScalersRawToDigi
- SiPixelRawToDigi from EventFilter/SiPixelRawToDigi
- SiStripExcludedFEDListProducer from EventFilter/SiStripRawToDigi

The following two were also modified in order to become multithread friend stream modules;
- HcalRawToDigi from EventFilter/HcalRawToDigi
- DTUnpackingModule from EventFilter/DTRawToDigi

While moving to the parameterSetDescription usually the autogenerated python configuration are some general one, with a general name which did not require removing the original explicit python config in the release. The only exceptions in this PR are:
-  EventFilter/ESRawToDigi/python/esRawToDigi_cfi.py
- EventFilter/FEDInterface/python/EvFFEDSelector_cfi.py

which are both going to be removed from the release.
title: Multithread in a few HLT related plugins from the EventFilter packages
